analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/12/0xb5b2eb90588a2200aa0400c99203c6371b7009bd.sol:
	Contract ICO has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/12/0xb5b2eb90588a2200aa0400c99203c6371b7009bd.sol#454-456)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

RetrieveTokensFeature.retrieveTokens (/unique_chucks/12/0xb5b2eb90588a2200aa0400c99203c6371b7009bd.sol#333-341) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-alienToken.transfer(to,alienToken.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/12/0xb5b2eb90588a2200aa0400c99203c6371b7009bd.sol#341)

CommonSale.mintTokens (/unique_chucks/12/0xb5b2eb90588a2200aa0400c99203c6371b7009bd.sol#413-416) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(this,tokens) (/unique_chucks/12/0xb5b2eb90588a2200aa0400c99203c6371b7009bd.sol#414-415)
	-token.transfer(to,tokens) (/unique_chucks/12/0xb5b2eb90588a2200aa0400c99203c6371b7009bd.sol#415-416)

FreezeTokensWallet.retrieveTokens (/unique_chucks/12/0xb5b2eb90588a2200aa0400c99203c6371b7009bd.sol#492-523) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(to,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/12/0xb5b2eb90588a2200aa0400c99203c6371b7009bd.sol#494-495)
	-token.transfer(to,tokensToRetrieve) (/unique_chucks/12/0xb5b2eb90588a2200aa0400c99203c6371b7009bd.sol#522-523)

ICO.finish (/unique_chucks/12/0xb5b2eb90588a2200aa0400c99203c6371b7009bd.sol#757-764) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/12/0xb5b2eb90588a2200aa0400c99203c6371b7009bd.sol)

Reentrancy in FreezeTokensWallet.start (/unique_chucks/12/0xb5b2eb90588a2200aa0400c99203c6371b7009bd.sol#489-492):
	External calls:
	- startBalance = token.balanceOf(this) (/unique_chucks/12/0xb5b2eb90588a2200aa0400c99203c6371b7009bd.sol#491)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- started (/unique_chucks/12/0xb5b2eb90588a2200aa0400c99203c6371b7009bd.sol#491-492)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/12/0xb5b2eb90588a2200aa0400c99203c6371b7009bd.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/12/0xb5b2eb90588a2200aa0400c99203c6371b7009bd.sol#1): it allows old versions
